name: The Thomas
description:
The story happens in a strange world where trains used to be the dominant animal on the earth. Human beings overthrew the trains after years of struggling and finally made train their slaves. 

Using  key "Space" to boost the train and left\right arrow or a\d to control the direction, Trying you best to hit the evil Human by your trunks. Don't forget to recollect your trunks after every attack.
